About Cabbage Looper Database

This database provides access to the cabbage looper genome assembly and annotations.

Raw data

This Whole Genome Shotgun project has been deposited at DDBJ/ENA/GenBank under the accession NKQN00000000. Sequencing data are available through the NCBI Sequence Read Archive under the accession number PRJNA336361.
